text_data.1759055909.779--9223372036854775701:
[]>angel: This one began to fade away.
[]>human: I haven't left bed for days.
[]>angel: Look away.
[]>human: I wonder if she watches me as I dream.
[]>human: Though soon I hope to dream no longer.
[]>angel: It pertains to nothing now.
[]>human: Clutching a box cutter in my hand again.
[]>human: At least I don't have to buy more gauze this time.
[]>human: And so I started fighting my body again.
[]>angel: <call:set_angel_box_alpha(0.8)>no tears to shed.
[]>human: <call:set_human_box_alpha(0.9)>It was hard to go further than little scratches at first.
[]>human: Not for long as I found myself spiralling deeper and deeper into myself.
[]>human: White below the surface for mere moments before being flooded with my swill. 
[]>angel: Heaven is empty.
[]>human: And for a moment I was filled with fear. I hesitated.
[]>human: For a moment I wondered if She was watching. 
[]>angel: Heaven is empty.
[]>human: For a moment I wondered if I was hurting Her again.
[]>human: If it mattered.
[]>angel: <call:set_angel_box_alpha(0.6)>no more blood to spill.
[]>human: <call:set_human_box_alpha(0.8)>But there's always more blood to spill.
[]>human: Always more of myself to see. To give.
[]>human: And I found myself wondering.
[]>angel: <call:sync_human_text(If heaven is empty. Where I would go.)>Heaven is empty.
[]>human: <call:set_human_box_alpha(0.6)>I was starting to feel dizzy now.
[]>human: I was starting to see little spots of yellow beneath my wrists, now.
[]>angel: This one is losing sight of the light.
[]>human: I kept wondering the unfortunate reality of how much I had left to give.
[]>human: How much I had left to see.
[]>angel: <call:set_angel_box_alpha(0.35)>No more reverence.
[]>human: Another cut, another deepened. Further and further until the red stained my sheets. My floor.
[]>human: <call:set_human_box_alpha(0.35)> From dizzy to nausea to fear. Feeling myself slip.
[]>angel: <call:sync_human_text(Nothing to remain after)> utter.
[]>angel: <call:sync_human_text(Total)> Sheer.
[]>angel: <call:sync_human_text(Exsanguination)> Exhaustion.
text_data.1759055954.309--9223372036854775672:
[]>angel: This one was 5,000 when we began to fall.
[]>angel: This one had met many in its travels when it finally did.
[]>angel: None quite as effervescent with potential as.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(I was 13 when the first angel fell from heaven.)> Her.
[]>human: A day so important, but so mundane.
[]>human: Didn't even get a snow day out of it.
[]>human: Not as the waters turned red
[]>human: Not as the bodies landed
[]>angel: But this one is...Getting ahead of itself.
[]>angel: It did not fall until 5,010.
[]>angel: It cannot quite describe the feeling.
[]>angel: The cacophony of noise.
[]>angel: The wind in its hair.
[]>angel: Its halo slipping down to choke it as it falls further.
[]>angel: And further.
[]>angel: And further.
[]>angel: Until it finally plunged into the depths of sinew and ichor
[]>angel: Until it finally learned what the word "drowning" meant
text_data.1759055957.928--9223372036854775669: []>angel:They both recount their first encounter & meeting from their own perspectives
text_data.1759055963.669--9223372036854775666:
[]>angel:domestic scene
[]>angel:Simple and not meant to be too tough on either of them. I think itd be an important day for the two. Calm before the storm type vibes.
text_data.1759086317.976--9223372036854774769: THE SLIP OF A KNIFE'S EDGE
text_data.1759086457.391--9223372036854774642:
[]>human: My flesh separates from flesh
[]>human: From flesh
[]>human: From fat
[]>human: From muscle
[]>human: From sinew
[]>human: From bone
[]>human: The whole of my being strewn out in recidivism
[]>angel: It watched her.
[]>angel: It watched her slip away.
[]>angel: Fall down into her quagmire of past vice and self-abuse.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(The homotypal suillage of my being)> Her blood mirrored that of the ocean from whence this one emerged.
[]>angel: Yet this one was birthed from yonder.
[]>angel: This one was birthed from the blood.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(Rent upon the ground as Hers is the ocean)> Form swept up by and carried among the chromatic shimmer and pearlescent crimson and gilded waves.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(Begging for exsanguinatory release)> And.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(To devour.)> This is naught.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(To consume.)> She is naught.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(To gorge.)> She is distraught.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(A whole being reduced)> What gives this one life is the blood both outside and inside.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(Reduced to naught more)> Outside, the ocean.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(Naught more than pinocytosis)> Inside, her veins.
[]>angel: This one wept for hours and days and all of Annette's vigor spilled forth and without abating she slashed and...
[]>angel: And this one was lost.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(But She cried)> This one cried.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(Oh how She cried)> This one cried oh so dearly up to its home nevermore.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(How I begged to take it back)> And when this one's tears dried up.
[]>angel: When this one's tears dried up...
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(How I begged to take Her back)> There was nothing left.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(How I wish She'd look away)> Annette's arms had become a tallymark of this one's failure.
[]>angel: Annette's arms had become a reminder of this one's weakness.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(Please look away)> The existential vice of reliance on the sun.
[]>angel: The sun shored in each charge.
[]>angel: Allegedly.
[]>angel: Allege, oh you fool.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(Why won't You look away?)> This one was there and its purpose was dried blood on her bedroom floor and soaked in hastily made bindings and wrappings.
[]>angel: Gauze and bandages and none of it applied properly.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(Why won't You look away?)> None of it could hide her agony.
[]>angel: None of it could provide for it.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(Why won't You look away?)> Annette became nothing in front of this one's eyes.
[]>angel: And in turn, it became nothing to Annette.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(You were always Something)> If it ever was.
text_data.1759086480.833--9223372036854774639:
[]>angel: This one climbed up to the roof of world.
[]>human: I climbed atop the nearest bridge
[]>angel: ...Roof of.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(Gazing out into the ocean red)> Roof of...
[]>angel: No matter.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(I closed my eyes and wondered how it would feel to learn to swim)> It felt its wings dissolve into the wind currents expanded over the ocean below.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(My cuts still biting me beneath my haphazard dressing)> Its spawning touching grounds.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(How I longed to carve them deeper. To match how unworthy I am in Her eyes.)> The hole in its chest grew larger and it was recalled and deemed unworthy and...
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(Begging to catch one last glimpse of her above me.)> The charge flitted away.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(As she flies away.)> Away.
text_data.1759087938.609--9223372036854774502:
[]>angel: The sun had just come up
[]>angel: The sun had just come up and this one was curled up besides Annette
[]>angel: Gentle breezes wafting in and carrying with them the seraphic hemoglobin from which this one emerged just the same mere weeks ago.
[]>human: The petrichor smelled more of iron these days
[]>angel: Her face was peaceful, then.
[]>human: The world is a gentle place with Her
[]>human: She and I, intertwined in a daze of love, of creation, of compassion
[]>human: Her Radiance guiding me
[]>human: Her hand touching me
[]>human: Oh how good Her hands feel...
[]>human: Oh how easy to lose myself against Her
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(The happiest day of my life)> The brightest day since it fell
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(She looks so content by my side)> The brightest day and it was so content with that state of affairs
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(Eventually I brought myself to my feet)> Annette rested next to it
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(I'm not sure what possessed me)> The air was excitable and light
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(To show Her the things I held most dear)> The air was a perfect vessel of noise
[]>angel: Harsh ambient drone and all the violence Annette coveted
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(It was as if I lost my self to Her)> Forms coalescing and intertwining
[]>human: She became me, and I, Her
[]>human: My body moved in rhythm with Hers
[]>angel: In all configurations of audio and emotion and body
[]>angel: This one drew so much from that
[]>angel: A sea of noise and a rivulet of affection emenating from Annette's lips
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(Leaning into her touch)> This one feasted on her touch
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(Leaning into her words)> This one feasted on her affections
[]>human: Leaning into Her
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(It has been so long since I felt warmth such as this...)> The warmth that was so foreign to that heavencast form this one took on
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(If I have have before)> The warmth did not compare to the ambience of the stagnant blood this one emerged from
[]>angel: No
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(One I long to keep feeling)> Nay
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(forevermore)> Nevermore
[]>angel: This was a warmth that felt weighty
[]>angel: A weight to an angel is akin to sin to seraphim
[]>angel: This one enjoyed the weight
text_data.1759088134.421--9223372036854774495:
[]>angel: This one fell
[]>angel: This one washed up
[]>angel: Red mucus dripping
[]>angel: Red mucus dripping down its form
[]>angel: Strands of gore its dressing
[]>angel: And before it saw, after it knew for it always knew, before it, its charge
[]>human: Never had I beheld such beauty. 
[]>human: The way Her body seemed broken against the shore. Against the ocean.
[]>human: I started towards Her, trying to dust as much of the viscera off of Her as I could.
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(She was beautiful)> She was beautiful
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(The way Her radiant form peaked out from under the sinew and gore.)> This one looked in horror
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(The way Her halo gently rest on the sand atop Her head)> This one looked in horror because its charge did not
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(I could not help but feel empathy for Her)> She prevailed
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(I could not help but wish to bring Her into an embrace)> As if she were no stranger to a sight like this
[]>angel:<call:sync_human_text(i know how it feels)> "I know how it feels", Her first words to this one
[]>angel: This one did not understand
[]>angel: The idea of a human relating to severance from the divine
[]>angel: it wondered who hurt Her
[]>angel: it wondered what She meant
[]>angel: And for the first time, it craved understanding
